definition: Jiyang county in Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2], Shandong
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
Jiyang county in Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2], Shandong

sentences.english: The basic features of the transition stage are elaborated in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細闡述了濟陽坳陷斷拗轉換期的基本特徵。

sentences.english: In the Jiyang depression, the main Carboniferous-Permian hydrocarbon source rocks are coals and dark mudstones.
sentences.chinese: 濟陽坳陷石炭二疊系烴源巖主要爲煤和暗色泥岩。

sentences.english: Zhuanghai district is located in the south of neritic area in Bohai gulf.
sentences.chinese: 摘要樁海地區位於濟陽坳陷渤海灣南部極淺海地區。

sentences.english: The formation of Paleozoic buried hills in Jiyang depression was chiefly controlled by tectonic movement.
sentences.chinese: 濟陽坳陷古生界潛山的形成主要受構造運動的控制。

sentences.english: The fundamental features of the geothermal field are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了濟陽坳陷地溫場的基本特徵。

sentences.english: The Shahejie Formation of the Paleogene is the main petroliferous strata in the Dngying Sag of Jiyang Depression in Bohai Bay Basin.
sentences.chinese: 濟陽坳陷東營凹陷的主要含油層係爲古近系沙河街組。

sentences.english: This paper presents six types of stratigraphic oil pools in Jiyang depression and the conditions of their formation.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了濟陽拗陷的六種地層油藏及其形成條件。
